entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Alliston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.9°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 4.
